explanation: The original print line treated q as a discount amount and computed the coupon option as p - q + min(d). However Q in the problem is the discounted drink price (not an amount to subtract from P). The correct total when using the coupon is Q + min(D_i). I fixed the single incorrect line to use q + min(d) instead of p - q + min(d).
fixed_code:
n, p, q = map(int, input().split(' '))
d = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
print(min(p, q + min(d)))
